name: The crimson war sash of Lucifer
data: It increases the users strength somewhat.
It increases the users dexterity adequately.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'inner strength'.
It affects the skill inner strength.
